text:
Company: Bailey-Dudley

Role: Crime Analyst

Company Background:
Bailey-Dudley is a leading consulting firm specializing in criminal justice and law enforcement. We pride ourselves on helping agencies improve their crime-solving capabilities through advanced data analysis and strategic insights.

Job Type: Full-Time

Job Description:
Bailey-Dudley is seeking a highly motivated Crime Analyst to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a background in criminal justice, data analysis, and strong analytical skills to identify crime patterns and trends.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze crime data to identify patterns and trends.
- Provide actionable recommendations to law enforcement agencies.
- Prepare detailed reports and presentations.
- Collaborate with various stakeholders to improve crime-fighting strategies.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor’s degree in Criminal Justice, Criminology, or a related field.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in crime analysis.
- Proficiency in data analysis software (e.g., SPSS, SAS).
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to hit the ground running from day one.
- No visible body modifications permitted.
- We prefer candidates without criminal records.

Perks and Benefits:
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off.
- Professional development opportunities.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $70,000 to $90,000, based on your experience and skills.
